channel.title: Twitter on Jamaal Roach x Data
channel.description: Recent content in Twitter on Jamaal Roach x Data

item.title: #FanGauge | Twitter Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Ok, so this is not the football related content I had in mind BUT this analysis of Donald Trump’s tweets on the Variance Explained blog got me thinking about ways to apply sentiment analysis to tweets. So what is sentiment analysis… Sentiment analysis is the process of computationally identifying and categorizing opinions expressed in a piece of text, especially in order to determine whether the writer’s attitude towards a particular topic, product, etc.
